#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

string A;

int main(){

    int t, d;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        bool toggle = false;
        cin>>A;
        cin>>d;
        A = " " + A;
        for(int i = d; i < A.length(); i++){
            toggle = !toggle;
            cout<<A[i];
        }
        if(toggle)  for(int i = d - 1; i >= 1; i--) cout<<A[i];
        else for(int i = 1; i <= d - 1; i++)    cout<<A[i];
        cout<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
